    工具

    工具名称 链接 对应论文 功能
    Key Recovery Attack for SPECK LINK “Improved Differential Cryptanalysis on SPECK Using Plaintext Structures”, ACISP 2023 搜索满足一型或二型结构的区分器
    Optimizing Rectangle Attacks LINK ”Optimizing Rectangle and Boomerang Attacks: A Unified and Generic Framework for Key Recovery”, JoC 2024 给定区分器，搜索最优Rectangle攻击
    OneStep Framework LINK “Probabilistic Extensions: A One-Step Framework for Finding Rectangle Attacks and Beyond”, EUROCRYPT 2024 概率性扩展的最优Rectangle攻击搜索框架
